short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension customizes your new tab page with beautiful photos with access to your top sites

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This add-on brings a fresh look to your new tab page. Get powerful search results, gorgeous Flickr photos and quick access to your top sites each time you open a new tab!
